law.catch_line: The Commission shall meet at least quarterly at the times and places that the Commission determines....

text.section: The Commission shall meet at least quarterly at the times and places that the Commission determines.

A member of the Commission:
may not receive compensation; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
The Archives shall provide staff services for the Commission.

section.section: The Commission shall be an advisory body for the Archives.

The Commission shall review and comment on:
the proposed budget of the Archives;
all proposed publications of the Archives; and
all proposed policies pertaining to the use of the Archives by the public.
